segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and the stool looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being quite patient, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like a scene from a comedy show, with all the chaos happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and catch the kids in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being quite brave, balancing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disgusting to see all that water on the floor, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman finishes her dishes soon and notices what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that the kids are being so sneaky, but it's also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
